page.title: 14DRUMOAK POPULATION CHANGES
page.content: A survey was conducted on people who have recently moved into the Drumoak area.Questions included:'why they chose Drumoak','where they lived before coming to Drumoak','the advantages and disadvantages of Drumoak'.Most people came from Scotland but some came from England.In answer to why they came to Drumoak, some said{'attractive area','small {rural community','country environment' People saw many advantages to living here 'quietness' 'no coastal fog' {'local people very friendly'. There were some disadvantages 'no shopping facilities','buses run only once an hour'.Most people replied{NO to the idea of further housing development.The majority of those interviewed{(50% of householders in {new housing areas)}said they would like to see a shop and garage built.
